Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.hdd_firmware_update.hdd_firmware_update

# Copyright (c) 2016-present, Facebook, Inc.
# All rights reserved.
#
# Description     : This test installs/updates the firmware for the drive type HDD.
# TestCase IDs    : UHDDT_005
# ==============================================================================
from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.storage.drive import DriveType
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.storage.drive_firmware_update import \
    DriveFirmwareUpdate



[docs]class HDDFirmwareUpdate(DriveFirmwareUpdate):
    """HDD Firmware Update.

    This test installs/updates the firmware for the drive type HDD and
    resets the drive to cross check the installed/updated firmware version
    reflects in the drive.
    """

    # @override

[docs]    def storage_test_setup(self):
        """Storage Test Setup.

        This method gets the drive list from the DUT, creates the test drives
        based on drive config for the drive type 'HDD', validates the drive count
        and firmware version for the test drives and collects the drive data as a
        part of prerequisite.

        Raises
        ------
        TestStepError
            When TestDrive lists is empty and Drive count mismatches
            between expected and actual values.
        TestError
            When fails to unmount and/or remove the partition from the drive.
        """
        # only pick HDD for testing
        self.test_control["drive_type"] = DriveType.HDD.value
        super(HDDFirmwareUpdate, self).storage_test_setup()


    # @override

[docs]    def update_drive_firmware(self, drive, version_name, bin_path):
        """Updates HDD's Firmware.

        This method updates the firmware based on the interface(sas/sata)
        and resets the drive by running power cycle command on jbod
        for each slot.

        Parameters
        ----------
        drive : :obj: 'Drive'
            The drive's name present in the host for the specific drive type.
        version_name : String
            Firmware version to find and install on test drives.
        bin_path : String
            Binary file path for the given firmware.

        Raises
        ------
        SASDriveException
            When fails to find the SAS Slot for HDD's Interface SAS.
        TestError
            When fails to update the firmware for the Drive and block
            name while drive reset.
        FbjbodUtilException
            When fails to map the jbod slots for the drive.
        """
        drive.update_firmware(version_name, bin_path)
        self.log_info("Resetting drive")
        drive.reset()



[docs]def main():
    test = HDDFirmwareUpdate()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
